'''''Beasts of Tolkien: A Colouring Book''''' is an [[Wikipedia:Coloring book#Adult coloring books|adult colouring book]], illustrated by Mauro Mazzara and Andrea Piparo. The illustrations are based on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s writings.<ref name=AMUK>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.amazon.co.uk/Tolkiens-World-Colouring-Mauro-Mazzara/dp/0753730200/|articlename=Tolkien's World: A Colouring Book|dated=|website=AMUK|accessed=1 June 2016}}</ref>

==From the publisher==

{{blockquote|This mystical colouring book presents an abundance of famous scenes and characters inspired by Tolkien's [[Middle-earth]]. From [[Gandalf]] the Grey to the humble [[Hobbits]], take time off from the busy pace of life and indulge your imagination while exploring the enthralling world of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and other tales. There's something new on every page as you discover the intricate elvish designs, fearsome characters and breath-taking landscapes - perfect to satisfy [[Fandom|Tolkien fans]] and beyond. This book is unofficial and not authorised by the [[Tolkien Estate]] or [[HarperCollins]] Publishers.<ref name=AMUK/>}}
